modules.description: This module segments Unicode text according to defined boundary types like grapheme clusters, words, sentences, and line breaks. It processes text incrementally, handling input without requiring a full in-memory representation, and supports custom segmentation logic. Concrete use cases include breaking text for display on constrained screens, analyzing linguistic units, and preparing text for line wrapping in document rendering.

This module performs Unicode text segmentation and pretty-printing on UTF-encoded strings, handling UTF-8, UTF-16BE, and UTF-16LE encodings. It provides functions to fold over text by grapheme clusters, words, sentences, or lines, and formatters that correctly handle Unicode character boundaries and line breaks. Use cases include text layout, string slicing by user-perceived characters, and formatting Unicode strings in a way that respects natural line wrapping and grapheme integrity.
